mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board VALUES ( seq_board.NEXTVAL, #{content}, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL, #{name}, #{ip}, #{password}, #{category}, NULL, NULL, NULL, #{title} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT seq, title, name, createdate, ceil(rownum / 10) as page FROM board WHERE category=#{categorynum} AND ${searchArea} like '%'||#{search}||'%' ORDER BY seq DESC) WHERE page = #{page}
